EmailTemplate.name: Customer Success Survey 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Customer Success Program
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!P_S_Survey_Recipient__c.Contact_First_Name__c},
As discussed, with the roll-out of Customer Success we are trying to get an early indicator on our impact and effectiveness.
I’d really value your responses to our questions and then I’ll follow up in about 90 days to see if we have moved the dial at all.
COMPLETE THE SURVEY
Finally, please feel free to reach out to me at any point moving forward.
Thanks again
Regards, Stephen Williams Director - Customer Success TechnologyOne
{!$Setup.EmailTemplateFields__c.Phone_Nos__c}
